ModMetaData.name: Tiered Mechs
ModMetaData.author: SuperPyroManiac
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 1.6.0
Adds new tiers of mechs to make them more useful late game. Advanced Tier required HighMechtech research. Built in Advanced Gestator. UltraTech Tier requires UltraMechtech research. Built in Advanced Gestator.
